question: In which country, "Limassol Salt Lake" is located?
explanation: Limassol Salt Lake, also known as Akrotiri Salt Lake, is the largest inland water body and the largest salt lake on the island of Cyprus, located in the Akrotiri and Dhekelia, the overseas sovereign territory of the United Kingdom. It is an important Ramsar Wetland of the Mediterranean region. This salt lake lies within Akrotiri and Dhekelia, a British Overseas Territory on the island of Cyprus, administered as a Sovereign Base Area of United Kingdom.
